Articles.Content: Hello all. I was listening to the radio the other day and I heard a commercial for some McDonalds food-product called 'Chicken McBites' Or some such thing. The nauseatingly smarmy commercial described the procedure of 'popping' them. I ask you all: just what in the HELL does that mean!?! :-\ Whatever it is, it sounds disgusting, just like every single other McDonalds product.
I am going to assume it is short for 'popping them in your mouth'. I think.

Hello all. I was listening to the radio the other day and I heard a commercial for some McDonalds food-product called 'Chicken McBites' Or some such thing. The nauseatingly smarmy commercial described the procedure of 'popping' them. I ask you all: just what in the HELL does that mean!?! :-\ Whatever it is, it sounds disgusting, just like every single other McDonalds product.

I assume the chicken mcbites are the same as the chicken bites here. They\'re just little cubes like chicken nuggets. Quite good.
Yeah, as retarded as the commercials are, they\'re rather tasty. The meat looks slightly more legit than chicken nuggets.

How McDonalds food looks in commercials:

How in real life:

How McDonalds food looks in commercials:

How in real life:

I think it looks better in real life, there...

In fact, I am pretty sure that \'real life\' photo isn\'t McDonalds. It looks too tasty.
Both pictures are from ads, I think...
Ah yes, yes. Legit meat.... Of course. McDonald\'s makes my throw up. =P

Mcdonalds is awesome.

Wendy\'s and BK are not, BK makes me throw up.

Wendy\'s is just to spicy which also makes me throw up.

KFC is good.

We don\'t have wendys here (unless its that icecream chain wendys). Mcdonalds is ok, but never cooked the way I want it. BK and KFC are ok as well but I perfer mcdonalds. Subway would be my first choice, as it is nice, and the way I want it.

We don\'t have wendys here (unless its that icecream chain wendys, but we still get there ads). Mcdonalds is ok, but never cooked the way I want it. BK and KFC are ok as well but I perfer mcdonalds. Subway would be my first choice, as it is nice, and the way I want it.

No the fast food place Wendy\'s.

I do prefer McDonalds more.

Mcdonalds is awesome.

Wendy\'s and BK are not, BK makes me throw up.

Wendy\'s is just to spicy which also makes me throw up.

KFC is good.

Go see how McDonalds makes their chicken. Then come back and tell me if you still like it.

Go see how McDonalds makes their chicken. Then come back and tell me if you still like it.

I eat there Chicken all the time...

I eat there Chicken all the time...

Did you see how they make it? Notice how it is always so soft, and white? Yeah? Well, go see how they make it.

Oh, and are you sure it is all chicken?

BK definitely has nicer burgers than Mcdonalds. Nice thick slices of tomatoes and whole lettuce leaves vs Mcdonalds pile of lettuce slivers.

Wendy\'s is ok too. The one I\'ve been to here in NZ still used american sizes for their drinks. So the medium was MASSIVE, bigger than the larges everywhere else.
Everyone is forgetting the king of them all, Steak \'N\' Shake! ;P And yes, I agree. American sizes are humongous.
